verses.name: Psalms 116:1
verses.text: I love the Lord, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.

verses.name: Psalms 116:2
verses.text: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.

verses.name: Psalms 116:3
verses.text: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.

verses.name: Psalms 116:4
verses.text: Then called I upon the name of the Lord; O Lord, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.

verses.name: Psalms 116:5
verses.text: Gracious is the Lord, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.

verses.name: Psalms 116:6
verses.text: The Lord preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.
